Interface TerremarkVCloudAsyncApi

All Superinterfaces:
Closeable, TerremarkVCloudAsyncClient
Deprecated. The async interface will be removed in jclouds 1.7. 

@Deprecated
public interface TerremarkVCloudAsyncApi
extends TerremarkVCloudAsyncClient

Provides access to VCloud resources via their REST API.
